Posts.Content: Jap08 wrote: I was dx 3 years ago with bone only disease.  On tomx. and zometa for three years, had a recurrence in spine area and ONC put me on chemo (toxal) since August, 11.  My CA27 29 has decreased to 41. Now I am having a burning sensation in my upper back. Anyone experience a buring sensation after staring chemo. I guess the chemo is working?? When and what labs do ONC look at to determine if you are NED?  Log in to post a reply
